text: Vasyl Yuriyovych Turyanchyk (; born 17 April 1935) is a former Ukrainian defender and coach. ==Honors== ;Dynamo Kyiv * Soviet Top League: 1961, 1966, 1967, 1968 * Soviet Cup: 1964, 1966 ;Individual * Ukrainian Footballer of the Year: 1967, 1968 (shared) ==References== *Turyanchyk at kopanyi myach *Maksymov, M. 50 years of Victory. Vasyl Turyanchyk: "For Dynamo all that is needed!" ... (50 лет победы. Василий Турянчик: "Для "Динамо" – все, что угодно!"…). UA-Football. 26 April 2011. title: Vasyl Turyanchyk
